meta.title: Alert
meta.desc: Alert informs users about important events.

meta.title: Artboard
meta.desc: Artboard provides fixed size container to display a demo content on mobile size.

meta.title: Avatar
meta.desc: Avatars are used to show a thumbnail representation of an individual or business in the interface.

meta.title: Badge
meta.desc: Badges are used to inform user of the status of specific data.

meta.title: Breadcrumbs
meta.desc: Breadcrumbs helps users to navigate through the website.

meta.title: Button group
meta.desc: Button group shows buttons next to each other.

meta.title: Button
meta.desc: Buttons allows user to take actions or make choices.

meta.title: Card
meta.desc: Cards are used to group and display content in a way that is easily readable.

meta.title: Carousel
meta.desc: Carousel show images or content in a scrollable area.

meta.title: Checkbox
meta.desc: Checkboxes are used to select or deselect a value.

meta.title: Collapse
meta.desc: Collapse is used for showing and hiding content.

meta.title: Countdown
meta.desc: Countdown gives you a transition effect of changing numbers

meta.title: Divider
meta.desc: Divider will be used to separate content vertically or horizontally.

meta.title: Drawer
meta.desc: Drawer is a grid layout that can show/hide a sidebar on the left or right side of the page.

meta.title: Dropdown
meta.desc: Dropdown can open a menu or any other element when the button is clicked.

meta.title: Footer
meta.desc: Footer can contain logo, copyright notice, and links to other pages.

meta.title: Hero
meta.desc: Hero is a component for displaying a large box or image with a title and description.

meta.title: Indicator
meta.desc: Indicators are used to place an element on the corner of another element.

meta.title: Input group
meta.desc: Input group puts an input next to a text or a button.

meta.title: Text Input
meta.desc: Text Input is a simple input field.

meta.title: Kbd
meta.desc: Kbd is used to display keyboard shortcuts.

meta.title: Link
meta.desc: Link adds the missing underline style to links.

meta.title: Mask
meta.desc: Mask crops the content of the element to common shapes.

meta.title: Menu
meta.desc: Menu is used to display a list of links vertically or horizontally.

meta.title: Code mockup
meta.desc: Code mockup is used to show a block of code in a box that looks like a code editor.

meta.title: Phone mockup
meta.desc: Phone mockup shows a mockup of an iPhone.

meta.title: Window mockup
meta.desc: Window mockup shows a box that looks like an operating system window.

meta.title: Modal
meta.desc: Modal is used to show a dialog or a box when you click a button.

meta.title: Navbar
meta.desc: Navbar is used to show a navigation bar on the top of the page.

meta.title: Pagination
meta.desc: Pagination is a group of buttons that allow the user to navigate between a set of related content.

meta.title: Progress
meta.desc: Progress bar can be used to show the progress of a task or to show the passing of time.

meta.title: Radial progress
meta.desc: Radial progress can be used to show the progress of a task or to show the passing of time.

meta.title: Radio
meta.desc: Radio buttons allow the user to select one option from a set.

meta.title: Range slider
meta.desc: Range slider is used to select a value by sliding a handle.

meta.title: Rating
meta.desc: Rating is a set of radio buttons that allow the user to rate something.

meta.title: Select
meta.desc: Select is used to pick a value from a list of options.

meta.title: Stack
meta.desc: Stack visually puts elements on top of each other.

meta.title: Stat
meta.desc: Stat is used to show numbers and data in a box.

meta.title: Steps
meta.desc: Steps can be used to show a list of steps in a process.

meta.title: Swap
meta.desc: Swap allows you to toggle the visibility of two elements using a checkbox or a class name.

meta.title: Tabs
meta.desc: Tabs can be used to show a list of links in a tabbed format.

meta.title: Table
meta.desc: Table can be used to show a list of data in a table format.

meta.title: Textarea
meta.desc: Textarea allows users to enter text in multiple lines.

meta.title: Toggle
meta.desc: Toggle is a checkbox that is styled to look like a switch button.

meta.title: Tooltip
meta.desc: Tooltip can be used to show a message when hovering over an element.
